sent.orig: The department will be closed on Special Holiday Replacement Holiday and Public Holiday.
sent.trans: 本校特定休假日，本部不办公；若该日有上课则展延至下周进行。

sent.orig: There is so much holiday around. What holiday is today?
sent.trans: 这里有这么浓的节日气氛。今天是什么节？

sent.orig: Children's Day, our holiday, happy holiday.
sent.trans: 六一儿童节，我们的节日，快乐的节日。

sent.orig: For the convenience of the public holiday, home, the Government has enacted a statutory holiday.
sent.trans: 为了便利市民过节、回乡，政府还发布了法定假期。

sent.orig: The holiday was bad and the food dreadful. Altogether the holiday was very disappointing.
sent.trans: 天气又坏，吃的又糟，总而言之，这次假日很扫兴。
